text: Antoaneta Stefanova (; born 19 April 1979) is a Bulgarian chess grandmaster and Women's World Champion from 2004 to 2006. She has been a representative for Bulgaria in the Chess Olympiad in 2000 and the Women's Chess Olympiad since 1992. Category:1979 births Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Sportspeople from Sofia Category:Living people
title: Antoaneta Stefanova
